resources.string:
Welcome to RobuxEarny! An application where you can earn Robux effortlessly!
You just need to play some very simple mini games, It's completely free and you will be able to redeem your robux by accumulating your coins!
Please finish your current ticket first.
Earn lot of coins and redeem Robux!
The best and fastest app for earning Robux

This app has a special coin system with six packages.
Each package comes with a different amount of coins that corresponds to a different amount of Robux. By playing our mini-games, you can earn coins. The more coins you earn, the more packages you can redeem. This means you'll have more chances to earn Robux! It's a simple way to earn Robux and have fun along the way!

"
When you are ready press the start button below and start right now to earn a lot of Robux!
In order to send you the Robux don't forget to click on the ads as much as you can.
This app is still in beta but in the future we will add much more games!
"

Follow this guide for redeeming your Robux:

1) Log in to Roblox: Use your Roblox username and password to log in.

2) Go to "Create": Click on "Create" button on the top.

3) Open Your Game: Select a game for adding a gamepass.

4) Add a Gamepass: Click on "Associated Items," choose "Passes," and add your Gamepass.

5) Customize Your Gamepass: Give it a name and description.

6) Set the Price: Set the price to %d Robux.

7) Save It: Save it, click on the … button and copy the link.

8) Paste the link: Paste the link below and you are ready to go.
Is the Gamepass URL correct and do you want to confirm?
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
Request sent! You will receive your Robux soon.
Join our Robux earning Discord server
Please connect to the internet to use this app.
You are not allowed to use this app on rooted devices.
Earn 200 coins every time somebody uses your referral code!
"This is my RobuxEarny's referral code: %s, download the app from Google Play and get a coin bonus!"
Q: Will i receive my Robux?
A: Yes, you will receive your Robux as long as you watch the ads.
Q: Why my coins are not being saved?
A: Your coins will be saved only after you finish watching an ad video.
Q: When are the Robux sent?
A: The Robux will be sent to you normally in 1–2 days, but there may be variations.
Q: How can I contact you?
A: Compile the contact form on our website https://robuxrush.com
The referral code is not valid

Congratulations! You won a 15 points bonus!

Complete surveys and the coins corresponding to the earned Robux will be added to your Robux Earny account!
